thread.title: Our First 100 Days Project Launches With New Angel Olsen Track “Fly On Your Wall”
thread.title_full: Our First 100 Days Project Launches With New Angel Olsen Track “Fly On Your Wall”

author: Chris DeVille
title: Our First 100 Days Project Launches With New Angel Olsen Track “Fly On Your Wall”
text: Chris DeVille @chrisdeville | 12:11 pm Share < br />this article: Today marks the beginning of Donald Trump’s presidency, and among the many musical acts of resistance is the Our First 100 Days campaign, an anti-Trump charity initiative featuring new songs from a wealth of today’s best musicians. Subscribers can download all the songs for a minimum of $30 with proceeds donated to a range of progressive charities. Mitski, Toro Y Moi, the Mountain Goats, How To Dress Well, PWR BTTM, Strand Of Oaks, the Range, S. Carey, Will Oldham, and Jens Lekman are among the contributors, and it all kicks off today with a new song from Angel Olsen called “Fly On Your Wall.” Hear it below, and subscribe to the series here . Our First 100 Days by Our First 100 Days Tags: Angel Olsen Recommended for you
